title: All but 2 of my emotes are gone?? i paid money for some of them!
body: like the title says! all but 2 of my emotes are just, gone.. Riot, wtf?

replies.body:
Probably a UI bug. did you reboot the client?

Send a support ticket, worst-case scenario is they restore them from purchase history or a backup.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NEBcAkdE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-01T20:34:00.233+0000)
>
> Probably a UI bug. did you reboot the client?
> 
> Send a support ticket, worst-case scenario is they restore them from purchase history or a backup.

i submitted a ticket, but you're right, i hadn't tried restarting the client.
upon looking over the boards more, apparently it's just a launcher thing, and they still appear in game.. i haven't had the chance to actually launch a game yet, so i'll check when i can.
You should have checked the status and announcements before making a ticket.  You would save yourself trouble.
